name: Custom motorcycle paint - made to order -your idea onto a tank
description:
Custom motorcycle paint-
this listing is to show you what we can do and the cost is estimated-

I have been painting motorcycles for over 10 years-I receive a lot of similar questions i will try and answer here -Every bike is different so price and design depends on the specific bike and artwork wanted.For more detailed information and prices you need to contact me with any questions and ideas sararayart@gmail.com or message me here

The first step is to decide how much of the motorcycle you want painted-for a tank alone with the mural designs similar to the photos shown run between 900 and 1500 each- a set of fenders and an oil bag to match are extra and price depends on how much art is wanted on them as well as any body or prep work they need.

Some parts need bodywork and welding done and we can do that of course to get them ready for paint-we charge a standard rate we can quote per project.

we have tanks available if you are looking for a wall hanger or if you need help finding a matching tank for your current bike we can help there as well.

our process---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
the drawing is the first work done-with a deposit i start sketching your idea and emailing the rough drafts-when a final draft is decided on a final clean drawing is done.
with the approval of the clean drawing i start painting and send finished photos of the art-when it is finished the tank is prepped and clear coated and when its dry it is prepped ,finished and sent to you.

you can view more of our custom painted designs here
http://sararay.viewbook.com/album/motorcycles?p=1

name: Vampira portrait "Cemetery Smoke" 8.5" x 11"
description:
Vampira portrait "Cemetery Smoke"
I have always loved Vampira - i met her years ago and still contend she was one of the most beautiful women i had ever seen even at an advanced age.The original oil painting is on exhibit at the V for Vampira show in Hollywood CA
measures 8.5" x 11" professionally printed on card stock signed by the artist
shipped flat between cardboard with a sticker and postcard

name: Ruined And Wasted Giant Size Poster 25.00
description:
"Ruined and wasted"  19" wide x 25.5" tall.

A Blond bombshell in a leopard bikini and high heels floats above a crashed 1953 Chevrolet ,she holds with her the tools of a disaster a vintage revolver, a butterfly knife, chromed brass knuckles, a pearl handled switchblade and a smile ... purchaser of this poster will also get a Sara Ray promotional postcard and a vinyl sticker you can put on your own hot rod, lead sled or skateboard
~All posters are signed by the artist~
Free shipping in the USA and Canada
Free stickers/postcards with every order

name: Fortune in Chains-tattooed vintage circus sideshow pin up 15.00
description:
Fortune In Chains' 11" x 17" from an original oil painting by Sara Ray

She has eyes that men adore so And a torso even more so Lydia, oh Lydia, that encyclopedia Lydia, the queen of tattoo On her back is the Battle of Waterloo Beside it the Wreck of the Hesperus, too And proudly above waves the red, white and blue You can learn a lot from Lydia

signed by the artist and ships rolled in protective paper in a heavy duty tube
free shipping in the USA and Canada
9.00 everywhere else
comes with a free sticker and postcard
